filter.name: filter
filter.description: Filters to be applied. Each filter consists of a column, an operator and a value (comma separated). Example: id,eq,1

include.name: include
include.description: Columns you want to include in the output (comma separated). Example: posts.*,categories.name

exclude.name: exclude
exclude.description: Columns you want to exclude from the output (comma separated). Example: posts.content

order.name: order
order.description: Column you want to sort on and the sort direction (comma separated). Example: id,desc

size.name: size
size.description: Maximum number of results (for top lists). Example: 10

page.name: page
page.description: Page number and page size (comma separated). Example: 1,10

join.name: join
join.description: Paths (comma separated) to related entities that you want to include. Example: comments,users
